_comment: Configuration for Simple Story Books / 简单故事书配置
_instruction: Modify 'loot_chance' for probability (0.0-1.0). 'loot_tables' keys are the loot tables, values are comments. / 修改 'loot_chance' 调整概率 (0.0-1.0)。'loot_tables' 的键是战利品表，值是注释。

loot_tables.minecraft:chests/village/village_plains_: Village Plains House / 平原村庄房屋
loot_tables.minecraft:chests/end_city_treasure: End City Treasure / 末地城宝藏 (Disabled by default / 默认未启用)
loot_tables.minecraft:chests/woodland_mansion: Woodland Mansion / 林地府邸 (Disabled by default / 默认未启用)
